body_html:
Here is a screenshot of my cmake settings:

http://www.dropbox.com/s/wn3c8rdv9g0lk8n/cmake.jpg
First I click configure, then I click generate. After generation finishes, I open the Visual Studio file it created and then build ALL.

body:
Here is a screenshot of my cmake settings:

http://www.dropbox.com/s/wn3c8rdv9g0lk8n/cmake.jpg
First I click configure, then I click generate. After generation finishes, I open the Visual Studio file it created and then build ALL.
